title: Cannot pass build flags to go test, go run
body:
by **esko.luontola**: 
What steps will reproduce the problem?
Try to pass the -gcflags build flag to the go test or go run command:
go test -gcflags='-l'
go run -gcflags='-l' hello.go

What is the expected output?
The code should compile and use those build options.

What do you see instead?
The command fails with the message:
flag provided but not defined: -gcflags

Which compiler are you using (5g, 6g, 8g, gccgo)?
6g

Which operating system are you using?
Ubuntu 11.04 x86_64

Which revision are you using?  (hg identify)
f4470a54e6db weekly/weekly.2012-03-04
